languages.text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас без выражения.{/n} "Думаю, этого достаточно. Остальное и не важно. Кем я была, что делала — не важно. Главное теперь — служить вам, верно и без ошибок".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас без выражения.{/n} "Думаю, этого достаточно. Остальное и не важно. Кем я была, что делала — не важно. Главное теперь — служить вам, верно и без ошибок".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас без выражения.{/n} "Думаю, этого достаточно. Остальное и не важно. Кем я была, что делала — не важно. Главное теперь — служить вам, верно и без ошибок".

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉空洞地看着你。{/n}“我想，说这些应该就够了，其他的事情并不重要。我是什么人，曾做过什么，这些都不重要。重要的是，我会忠实地为你服务，不会犯任何错误。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉空洞地看着你。{/n}“我想，说这些应该就够了，其他的事情并不重要。我是什么人，曾做过什么，这些都不重要。重要的是，我会忠实地为你服务，不会犯任何错误。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."

languages.text: {n}Idira te mira inexpresiva.{/n} «Creo que eso es suficiente. El resto no importa. Quién era, qué hice... da lo mismo. Lo que importa ahora es que le sirvo a usted, fiel e infalible».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira te mira inexpresiva.{/n} «Creo que eso es suficiente. El resto no importa. Quién era, qué hice... da lo mismo. Lo que importa ahora es que le sirvo a usted, fiel e infalible».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラはぼんやりとあなたを見ている。{/n}「それで十分だと思うわ。あとはどうでもいいの。あたいが誰だったのか、何をしたのか…そんなことはどうでもいいでしょう。今大切なのは、陛下に忠実であり、間違いのないように仕えることなのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはぼんやりとあなたを見ている。{/n}「それで十分だと思うわ。あとはどうでもいいの。あたいが誰だったのか、何をしたのか…そんなことはどうでもいいでしょう。今大切なのは、陛下に忠実であり、間違いのないように仕えることなのだから」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt dich ausdruckslos an.{/n} "Ich denke, das reicht. Der Rest ist unwichtig. Wer ich war, was ich getan habe — es ist unwichtig. Wichtig ist nur, dass ich Euch diene — treu und fehlerfrei."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt dich ausdruckslos an.{/n} "Ich denke, das reicht. Der Rest ist unwichtig. Wer ich war, was ich getan habe — es ist unwichtig. Wichtig ist nur, dass ich Euch diene — treu und fehlerfrei."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira pose sur vous un regard vide.{/n} « Je crois que ça suffit. Le reste n'a aucune importance. Qui j'étais, ce que j'ai fait... On s'en moque. Tout ce qui compte, c'est que je vous sers, à présent. Fidèlement et sans commettre d'erreurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira pose sur vous un regard vide.{/n} « Je crois que ça suffit. Le reste n'a aucune importance. Qui j'étais, ce que j'ai fait... On s'en moque. Tout ce qui compte, c'est que je vous sers, à présent. Fidèlement et sans commettre d'erreurs. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, boş gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bence bu kadarı yeter. Gerisi mühim değil. Eskiden kim olduğumun, neler yaptığımın önemi yok. Şu an mühim olan, sana tüm sadakatimle ve hatasızca hizmet etmem."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you blankly.{/n} "I think that's enough. The rest doesn't matter. Who I was, what I did — it doesn't matter. What matters now is that I serve you — faithfully and with no mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, boş gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Sanırım bu kadarı yeter. Gerisi mühim değil. Benim kim olduğum, neler yaptığım... Mühim değil. Şu an mühim olan, sana hiçbir hata yapmadan tüm sadakatimle hizmet etmem."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
